column1: Uchi////We started our meal off with a nice bottle of Sho Chiku Bai sake from the Takara sake brewery in Berkeley
column2: CA. I visited the factory once during my college days
column3: and liked their sake quite much. It happened to be their cheapest bottle at 15 for 350mL
column4: which was nicely split amongst the four of us in nice wooden box cups.
